name: Manual of Golems
content:
Wondrous item, very rare



 This tome contains information and incantations  necessary to make a particular type of golem. The  GM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To  decipher and use the manual, you must be a  spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A  creature that canâ€™t use a manual of golems and  attempts to read it takes 6d6 psychic damage. 


d20GolemTimeCost1-5Clay30 days65,000 gp6-17Flesh60 days50,000 gp18Iron120 days100,000 gp19-20Stone90 days80,000 gp  To create a golem, you must spend the time shown  on the table, working without interruption with the  manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours  per day. You must also pay the specified cost to  purchase supplies.  
   Once you finish creating the golem, the book is  consumed in eldritch flames. The golem becomes  animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled  on it. It is under your control, and it understands and  obeys your spoken commands.
